channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FBI Says Enable 2FA Now As Cyber Attacks Surge
item.description: As threat intelligence shows ransomware attacks surging by up to 1,400%, do not ignore this critical FBI warning.

item.title: Balancing Innovation And Data Volume To Strengthen Data Privacy
item.description: Organizations can strengthen their overall security strategy by evaluating both the technologies they use and the volume of data they manage.

item.title: iOS 18.5—Apple Reveals New Plans To Boost iPhone AI And User Privacy
item.description: Apple has confirmed it will launch a new privacy-focused AI training system in iOS 18.5. Here's what you need to know.
